title: Exercise Histories of Eating-Disordered and Control Subjects
description:
Description
The Blackmore data frame has 945 rows and 4 columns.
Blackmore and Davis's data on exercise histories of 138 teenaged
girls hospitalized for eating disorders and 98 control subjects.
reference:
Personal communication from Elizabeth Blackmore and Caroline Davis,
York University.

parameters.subject: a factor with subject id codes.  There are several observations for each subject, but because the girls were hospitalized at different ages, the number of cases and the age at the last case vary.
parameters.exercise: the amount of exercise in which the subject engaged, expressed as estimated hours per week.
parameters.age: subject's  age  in  years  at  the  time  of  observation;  all  but  the  last observation for each subject were collected retrospectively at intervals of two years, starting at age 8.

format: This data frame contains the following columns:
